name: Litfulo
indications: litfulo kinase inhibitor indicated treatment severe alopecia areata adults adolescents 12 years older . limitations : recommended combination jak inhibitors , biologic immunomodulators , cyclosporine potent immunosuppressants .
contraindications: • recommended testing , evaluations immunizations prior litfulo initiation , full prescribing information . ( 2.1 ) • recommended 50 mg orally daily . ( 2.2 ) • interruption certain , full prescribing information . ( 2.4 )
warningsAndPrecautions: litfulo capsules packaged child-resistant , white , high-density polyethylene ( hdpe ) bottles polypropylene ( pp ) cap foil heat induction seal liner . bottles contain 1g desiccant high-density polyethylene ( hdpe ) canister . eat desiccant . form strength description bottle size ( number capsules ) ndc number capsules 50 mg ritlecitinib size 3 , opaque capsules yellow body blue cap . body printed “ rcb 50 ” cap printed “ pfizer ” black . 28 count bottle 0069-0334-28
adverseReactions: litfulo contraindicated patients known hypersensitivity ritlecitinib excipients [ ( 5.6 ) ] .
indications_original:
LITFULO is a kinase inhibitor indicated for the treatment of severe alopecia areata in adults and adolescents 12 years and older. 
                  
                     Limitations of Use: Not recommended for use in combination with other JAK inhibitors, biologic immunomodulators, cyclosporine or other potent immunosuppressants.
contraindications_original: • For recommended testing, evaluations and immunizations prior to LITFULO initiation, see Full Prescribing Information. ( 2.1 ) • Recommended dosage is 50 mg orally once daily. ( 2.2 ) • For dosage interruption for certain adverse reactions, see Full Prescribing Information. ( 2.4 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
LITFULO capsules are packaged in child-resistant, white, high-density polyethylene (HDPE) bottles with polypropylene (PP) cap with a foil heat induction seal liner. The bottles contain 1g of desiccant in a high-density polyethylene (HDPE) canister. Do not eat the desiccant.

adverseReactions_original: LITFULO is contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to ritlecitinib or any of its excipients [see Warnings and Precautions (5.6)].
